tool_description: Matches potential reviewers to manuscripts by analyzing semantic similarity between reviewer expertise and paper content.

paper_abstract.description: Abstract text of the paper needing review

matching_algorithm.description: Algorithm to use: semantic, keyword, hybrid

recency_factor.description: Weight for recent publications in matching (0-1)

error_messages: Empty or invalid abstract: Provide a substantive paper abstract with at least 50 characters.
Invalid matching algorithm: Use one of [semantic, keyword, hybrid].
Score parameters out of range: minimum_score, field_weighting, recency_factor must be between 0 and 1.
Too many reviewers: Limit to 200 reviewer IDs for processing efficiency.
Invalid reviewer IDs: Some provided reviewer identifiers do not exist.
usage: Provide paper_abstract, paper_keywords, and reviewer_ids to get relevance matching. Adjust matching_algorithm, minimum_score, field_weighting, and recency_factor to fine-tune results. Use exclude_keywords to filter unwanted matches.

match_explanations.description: Brief explanations of why each reviewer was matched

top_matches.description: Reviewer IDs ranked by relevance score

matching_summary.description: Summary of matching process and overall results
